alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 9:17AM EDT until April 23 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Columbia SC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Richland, Calhoun and Lexington Counties. Saluda River At Chappells affecting Newberry, Saluda and Greenwood Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Congaree River At Carolina Eastman. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 115.0 feet, Flooding occurs in low lying areas of the Carolina Eastman Facility and at the Congaree National Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 112.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Wednesday morning to a crest of 116.5 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 115.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and take action if necessary. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 10 PM EDT.
